title: DNA Vaccine Developer Inovio Biomedical Changes Name to Inovio Pharmaceuticals
description: BLUE BELL, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Inovio Biomedical Corporation (NYSE Amex: INO), a leader in the development of new preventive and therapeutic vaccines against cancers and infectious diseases, | BLUE BELL, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Inovio Biomedical Corporation (NYSE Amex: INO), a leader in the development of new preventive and therapeutic vaccines against cancers and infectious diseases,
